content.title: Kisan Samriddhi Yojana - Chhattisgarh
content.details: This scheme provide grant to farmers on tube well mining and pump installation. The main objective of the scheme is to increase the productivity and crop intensity by making proper use of available ground water through tube wells and providing irrigation facilities to the crops.
benefits: Mining Grant: General farmers can receive the actual cost of mining (including casing pipe) or Rs. 10,000/- whichever is less. SC/ST farmers can receive the actual cost of mining (including casing pipe) or Rs. 18,000/- whichever is less.

Subsidy on pump installation: General farmers can receive the cost of pump and accessories or Rs. 20,000/- whichever is less. SC/ST farmers can receive the cost of pump and accessories or Rs. 25,000/- whichever is less.
eligibility: Farmers of all categories of districts will be benefited.
Preference will be given to small and marginal farmers.
The farmers who have received the benefit of tube well mining grant in the past under any other scheme run by the department or under this scheme will not be eligible.
content.application_process: Applicant farmer need to approach panchayat first. The selection of farmers will be done with the approval of the three-tier panchayat.

faqs.question: Who can get the benefits?
faqs.answer: Farmers of all categories of districts will be benefited. Preference will be given to small and marginal farmers.

faqs.question: Can people from other states also apply for this scheme?
What is the financial eligibility for applicant?
What is the minimum age eligibility?
faqs.answer: The age of the applicant should be above 18 years.

faqs.question: How To Apply For The Scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicant farmer need to approach panchayat first. The selection of farmers will be done with the approval of the three-tier panchayat.

faqs.question: What are the required documents?
faqs.answer: Aadhaar Card, Land paper, Photograph, Bill Invoice.
